dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Welcome. I will take your orders here.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: This cafeteria is consistently bustling, but now is its busiest hour. Quite understandable, as to go through a day without a cup of tea would be to stumble through it with a mind that is only half awake.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Designating time for quick elevenses or an afternoon tea is a wise managerial choice, considering they are known to improve work efficiency. I will take your orders here.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: We take orders into the late hours for our colleagues working night shifts or overtime. If you are off duty tonight, may I brew you some nice tea with a dash of Sherry or Brandy?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: This cafeteria is an employee—run establishment by members of the Seven Association who love tea more than anything else in the world. Shifts are all voluntary, and we return to our usual duties on our off hours. Ah, and it goes without saying that all profits go to purchasing higher—quality tea leaves and teapots.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: THE MILK!...should already be in the cup before the tea is poured. That is our...recommended way.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
You'd like some... ice? Apologies, but this establishment does not serve iced 'tea'.
If it is of no trouble to you, may I take a moment of your time to explicate why black tea must be enjoyed at higher temperatures?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Ah, I am occupied at the present moment.
While I always enjoy our tea discussions, it must wait for now.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Precise work ethic and talent for brewing tea of exact, pure flavor. Faust considers these as her two primary objectives.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: To over—infuse your tea is to allow impure flavors to surface. Please refrain from doing so.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Yes, of course. You may call upon me at any time should the need arise. Unless it's tea time, that is.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: An urgent order, yes?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I will rendezvous with you out in the field.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Before the tea cools.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Flawless.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Like shattered tea leaves.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ah…

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: There is no more information to be gained.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Haah... But... I don't have anyone... to cover my next shift...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: A result of meticulous observation.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... I should have observed more carefully.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: This mission was a success. Ah, now I must leave for my shift at the cafeteria. So, if you will excuse me...

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Milk tea, please. Poured, not stirred. Indeed, tea tastes better when it is served to you rather than when you serve it yourself.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: That was... unexpected. We must not have ingested enough tea. Let us take some time off for tea before our next attempt.
